name: Gadeva - HMTL5 Version
description:
Feature
  • 2d adventure game with a look similar to the classic pokemon game
  • Light and fun story game
  • Three mini games where each game has two rounds and is very fun to play
Premise

Game world themed adventure game with a core game focus on mini games. The story of this game tells of a student who wants to become a game developer but suddenly gets stuck in the game world.

Core loop

Players will accept challenges from the boss in the form of mini games, players will get an achievement if they win it. When a new achievement is obtained, a new challenge will open. When all achievements are obtained, a portal will appear that will bring players back to their original world.
